• As India gears up to become a global economic powerhouse with an assest of 62% of the population in the working age group and more than 54% of the total population below 25 years of age, it becomes imperative to focus on their capacity building for improved productivity and economic growth. 
• This comes as a challenge as well as an oppurtunity not only for quantitative expansion of facilities but also in raising quality of skill and knowledge. 
• The conceptualization of Sannibh Technologies is a small step towards this big leap. 
• The inception of Sannibh which literally means rays of light is grounded with the belief to act as a 'light house' for the present day youth with an aim to empower individuals and improve their social acceptance. 
• The objective of Sannibh Technologies is to enable a large number of youth to take up industry-relevant skill training that will help them in securing a better livelihood. 
• Our sole aim is to nurture the youth impressively and to prepare practitioners who are globally competitive as well as committed towards their profession and who can thrive well in this volatile economy. 
• Our credo is to help individuals:
Sail Across with Nurturing and Networking to Invincible Big Heights\n

\u2022 To achieve this and set up benchmarking standards in the academic as well as corporate world, our services to the learners include Technical Training in the area of Mobile Technology, Web Technology, Information Security, Big Data, etc. as per global standards, Mentoring and also nurturing and grooming them through our Finishing School. \n\u2022 Our deliverables also include Software Development and solutions in the area of Web Development, Mobile Application Development, Software Testing and Quality Assurance, Ethical Hacking and Information Security, etc. \n\u2022 Besides this we are strong advocates of Continuing Personal and Professional Development for which we offer well defined and designed as well as customized training packages for academic as well as corporate sector across various spectrums.
